price: 22. ¿Cómo no iba a adorar a Quien me creó y a Quien habrán de retornar (para ser juzgados)?
arabic: وَمَالِيَ لَآ أَعۡبُدُ ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَنِي وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wamā liya lā aʿbudu alladhī faṭaranī wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
